sentences.english: Indigos and Crystals are extremely sensitive.

sentences.english: The main products of our company are indigo-dyed bobbin and knitted jean fabric collection.

sentences.english: Objective To compare the relative content of Indirubin and Indigo of Indigowoad root from different areas.

A great many stars were shining in the indigo blue sky.

sentences.english: Indigo shows the similar adsorbable performance to the three kinds of protein as Langmuir's.
sentences.chinese: 靛蓝对三种酶蛋白的吸附和朗格缪尔吸附大致吻合。

sentences.english: "The vinegar sets the indigo and keeps it from fading, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说“醋可以使靛蓝稳定，防止牛仔裤褪色。”

sentences.english: Denim fabric bio-washed with acidic cellulase was further treated with laccase.
